name: Justin Time: Man of the Hour
name_original: Justin Time: Man of the Hour
description:
A deckbuilding rougelike that follows Justin Time as he tries to stave off waves of robots from the the evil nation of Procrasti! Every turn you’ll have 10 seconds to plan out the best way to use your cards, but be careful, your mana IS the time left in the turn so every second you pause to think will cut into your ability to play cards!

Made in Unity in 72 hours by: Matt Martone, Jonathan Merrin, and Nazli Uzgur.
Music from Ultimate Music and SFX Bundle, Art inspiration from the Dungeons and Dragons Monster Manual, Some card assets from CCG Kit by gamevanilla, DS-Digital, Hey Comic, and Vindicator Fonts.
